tool-switcher.midnightconfig.title: Tool Switcher
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.enabled.too: Enable or disable the mod. Can be toggled with a keybind
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.sneaking.to: Whether Tool Switcher remains active while sneaking
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.showMessage: Whether to show a message on the screen when keybind is pressed
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.goBack.tool: Whether to switch back to the slot you were on before mining
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.respectSilk: Whether to not switch tools if you are holding a Silk Touch or Fortune Tool
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.disabledToo: Tools that don't get switched to
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.disabledBlo: Blocks that don't trigger tool switcher
